name: The Killer Crab
description:
This game was made for the " I can't draw but want to make a game " game jam by Kourosh824.

It has been a while since humans have been destroying the crab's beach by littering. Now the crab has decided to do something himself by making the humans go away. So he has two missions right now, the first one is to keep the beach clean by collecting the garbages and taking them to the trashcan and the second one is to use all of the garbages that he has collected in order to craft some traps and kick the humans out of the beach.

Special thanks to ArashTheGD for testing the game.

Have fun playing!
